Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.sw2019.model.Weapon

  • public class Weapon
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    poligenius class written to keep track of weapons, contains some logic to apply effects

      • usableWeaponBeforeComplexAction

        public boolean usableWeaponBeforeComplexAction(java.util.List<Player> allPlayers)
        Call this method before showing the possibility to do a shooting action
        Parameters:
        allPlayers - all players
        Returns:
        true if the weapon can be used before a complex action

      • usableWeapon

        public boolean usableWeapon(java.util.List<Player> allPlayers)
        Calculates if is possible to use this weapon by the owner
        Parameters:
        allPlayers - all the players in the game, passed by the Player when the method is called
        Returns:
        true if the weapon is usable, false if not

      • usableEffects

        public java.util.List<Effect> usableEffects(java.util.List<Player> allPlayers)
        this method is called by controller
        Parameters:
        allPlayers - all the players in the game
        Returns:
        all effects that are usable

      • hasOneUsableEffect

        public boolean hasOneUsableEffect(java.util.List<Player> allPlayers)
        this method is useful to implement usableWeapon()
        Parameters:
        allPlayers - all players
        Returns:
        true if the weapon has at least one usable effect (excluding move type effect)
